hints_html: Split the fraction into the sum of two fractions.
hints_latex: Split the fraction into the sum of two fractions.
hints_raw: Split the fraction into the sum of two fractions.
question: 1 (a)
sols_html:
Using the hint, we see that

\[\begin{aligned} \int_{1}^{2} \frac{x^{2}+2}{x^{2}}\, dx &= \int_{1}^{2} \left(\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}} + \frac{2}{x^{2}}\right)\, dx\\ &= \int_{1}^{2} (1 + 2x^{-2})\, dx\\ &= \left.\left(x - 2x^{-1}\right) \right|_{1}^{2}\\ &= (2-2(2)^{-1}) - (1 - 2(1)^{-1}) \\ &= (2-1) - (-1)\\ &= 2\end{aligned}\]
sols_raw:
Using the hint, we see that

<math>
\begin{align}
\int_{1}^{2} \frac{x^{2}+2}{x^{2}}\, dx &= \int_{1}^{2} \left(\frac{x^{2}}{x^{2}} + \frac{2}{x^{2}}\right)\, dx\\
&= \int_{1}^{2} (1 + 2x^{-2})\, dx\\
&= \left. \left(x - 2x^{-1}\right) \right|_{1}^{2}\\
&= (2-2(2)^{-1}) - (1 - 2(1)^{-1}) \\
&= (2-1) - (-1)\\
&= 2
\end{align}
</math>
